XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for all tables related to local_swtc

TABLE.NAME: local_swtc_userinvitation
TABLE.COMMENT: Holds all known information about the new user account invitation.

FIELD.NAME: timeexpiration
FIELD.COMMENT: when invitation should expire

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the user bookmark (what is displayed)

FIELD.NAME: url
FIELD.COMMENT: The url of the user bookmark

KEY.NAME: userid_name
KEY.COMMENT: The combination of userid and name must be unique.

TABLE.NAME: local_swtc_sc
TABLE.COMMENT: Holds all suggested course information for all courses.

FIELD.NAME: active
FIELD.COMMENT: Is the suggested course active (1) or not (0).

FIELD.NAME: accesstype
FIELD.COMMENT: The access type of the user

FIELD.NAME: usercreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user that created

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Time the definition was created

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user that modified

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time the definition was modified

FIELD.NAME: suggestedcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The courseid of the suggested course.

FIELD.NAME: clicks
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of times course was clicked from suggested courses.

FIELD.NAME: enrollments
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of course enrollments from suggested courses.

TABLE.NAME: local_swtc_sc_details
TABLE.COMMENT: Holds all details of each suggested course view and enrollment.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user that viewed, and possibly enrolled, in the suggested course.

FIELD.NAME: parentcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The parent courseid.

FIELD.NAME: suggestedcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The suggested courseid.

FIELD.NAME: dateclicked
FIELD.COMMENT: The date/time the user clicked the link.

FIELD.NAME: dateenrolled
FIELD.COMMENT: The date/time the user enrolled in the course (after clicking the link to view it).

TABLE.NAME: local_swtc_rc
TABLE.COMMENT: Holds all related course information for all courses including clicks and enrollments.

FIELD.NAME: active
FIELD.COMMENT: Is the related course active (1) or not (0).

FIELD.NAME: usercreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user that created.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Time the definition was created.

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user that modified.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time the definition was modified.

FIELD.NAME: parentcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The parent courseid.

FIELD.NAME: relatedcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The related courseid.

FIELD.NAME: clicks
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of times course was clicked from related courses.

FIELD.NAME: enrollments
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of course enrollments from related courses.

TABLE.NAME: local_swtc_rc_details
TABLE.COMMENT: Holds all details of each related course view and enrollment.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user that viewed, and possibly enrolled, in the related course.

FIELD.NAME: parentcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The parent courseid.

FIELD.NAME: relatedcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The related courseid.

FIELD.NAME: dateclicked
FIELD.COMMENT: The date/time the user clicked the link.

FIELD.NAME: dateenrolled
FIELD.COMMENT: The date/time the user enrolled in the course (after clicking the link to view it).

TABLE.NAME: local_swtc_port_access
TABLE.COMMENT: Portfolio access for all customized roles.

FIELD.NAME: roleid
FIELD.COMMENT: Taken from mdl_role.

FIELD.NAME: catid
FIELD.COMMENT: Taken from mdl_course_categories.

FIELD.NAME: access
FIELD.COMMENT: Roleid either has access (1) or does NOT have access (0) to portfolio (i.e. category).

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this record was created.

FIELD.NAME: usercreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The user that created this record.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The last time this record was modified.

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The last user that modified this record.
